con:request.name: create AOs filtering script
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         	<createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.payment.DEMOFilterScript" description="Demo AOs filtering script">
            <type>JAVA</type>
            <script>
            <![CDATA[
			package org.meveo.service.script.payment;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;

import org.apache.commons.collections4.CollectionUtils;
import org.meveo.commons.utils.EjbUtils;
import org.meveo.model.billing.Subscription;
import org.meveo.model.payments.AccountOperation;
import org.meveo.service.billing.impl.SubscriptionService;

public class DEMOFilterScript extends AccountOperationFilterScript {


    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
    @Override
    public List<AccountOperation> filterAoToPay(Map<String, Object> methodContext) {
        log.debug(" filterAoToPay : [{}]", methodContext);
        List<AccountOperation> listAoToPay = (List<AccountOperation>) methodContext.get(AccountOperationFilterScript.LIST_AO_TO_PAY);
        if (CollectionUtils.isEmpty(listAoToPay)) {
            return listAoToPay;
        }

        List<AccountOperation> filtredListAoToPay = new ArrayList<>();
        for (AccountOperation ao : listAoToPay) {
            if (ao.getAmount().intValue() > 10) {
                filtredListAoToPay.add(ao);
            }
        }
        return filtredListAoToPay;
    }
}  
 ]]>
            </script>
            <executionRoles name="administrateur"></executionRoles>
            <sourcingRoles name="administrateur"> </sourcingRoles>            
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>
      </ws:createOrUpdate>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: create Date Range Script Demo
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         	<createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.payment.CurrentMonthDateRangeScript" description="Demo AOs filtering script">
            <type>JAVA</type>
            <script>
            <![CDATA[
			package org.meveo.service.script.payment;

import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.Map;

import org.meveo.admin.job.DateRange;

public class CurrentMonthDateRangeScript extends DateRangeScript {

    @Override
    public DateRange computeDateRange(Map<String, Object> methodContext) {
        
        Calendar calFrom = Calendar.getInstance(); 
        calFrom.set(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH, 1);
        calFrom.set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, 0);
        calFrom.set(Calendar.MINUTE, 0);
        calFrom.set(Calendar.SECOND, 0);
        
        Calendar calTo = Calendar.getInstance();
        calTo.set(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH, calTo.getActualMaximum(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH)); // max day of the month
        calTo.set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, 0);
        calTo.set(Calendar.MINUTE, 0);
        calTo.set(Calendar.SECOND, 0);
        
        return new DateRange(calFrom.getTime(), calTo.getTime());
    }
}
 
 ]]>
            </script>
            <executionRoles name="administrateur"></executionRoles>
            <sourcingRoles name="administrateur"> </sourcingRoles>            
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>
      </ws:createOrUpdate>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: create ScriptInstance
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r
   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>\r
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         	<createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.payment.DDRequestBuilderDemo" description="Demo dd request file script">
            <type>JAVA</type>
            <script>
            <![CDATA[
			package org.meveo.service.script.payment;

import java.io.File;
import java.util.Map;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.admin.sepa.DDRejectFileInfos;
import org.meveo.admin.util.ArConfig;
import org.meveo.commons.utils.CsvBuilder;
import org.meveo.commons.utils.CsvReader;
import org.meveo.model.crm.Provider;
import org.meveo.model.payments.DDPaymentMethod;
import org.meveo.model.payments.DDRequestItem;
import org.meveo.model.payments.DDRequestLOT;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

/**
 * @author anasseh
 *
 */
public class DDRequestBuilderDemo extends DDRequestBuilderScript {

    Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(DDRequestBuilderDemo.class);

    /**
     * The param1
     */
    public String PARAM_1 = "value_1";
    /**
     * The param1
     */
    public String PARAM_2 = "value_2";

    /**
     * Any business rules to build the file name
     */
    @Override
    public String getDDFileName(Map<String, Object> methodContext) throws BusinessException {
        DDRequestLOT ddRequestLot = (DDRequestLOT) methodContext.get(DDRequestBuilderScript.DD_REQUEST_LOT);
        String fileName = "ddRequestBuilderDemo_lot_" + ddRequestLot.getId() + "_" + PARAM_1 + ".csv";
        String outputDir = ArConfig.getDDRequestOutputDirectory();
        log.info("DDRequest output directory=" + outputDir);
        File dir = new File(outputDir);
        if (!dir.exists()) {
            dir.mkdirs();
        }
        log.info("getDDFileName:" + outputDir + File.separator + fileName);
        return outputDir + File.separator + fileName;
    }

    @Override
    public void generateDDRequestLotFile(Map<String, Object> methodContext) throws BusinessException {
        DDRequestLOT ddRequestLot = (DDRequestLOT) methodContext.get(DDRequestBuilderScript.DD_REQUEST_LOT);
        Provider appProvider = (Provider) methodContext.get(DDRequestBuilderScript.PROVIDER);
        if (ddRequestLot == null || ddRequestLot.getDdrequestItems() == null) {
            throw new BusinessException("Cant find items from ddRequestLot ");
        }
        CsvBuilder csvBuilder = new CsvBuilder();
        // add header, for exmeple : crediteur;nbOperation
        String[] header = { appProvider.getCode(), "" + ddRequestLot.getDdrequestItems().size() };
        csvBuilder.appendValues(header);
        csvBuilder.startNewLine();
        for (DDRequestItem item : ddRequestLot.getDdrequestItems()) {
            // add details, for example : id,mandat;amount;value2
            DDPaymentMethod ddPaymentMethod = (DDPaymentMethod) item.getAccountOperations().get(0).getCustomerAccount().getPreferredPaymentMethod();
           //The correlation ID
            csvBuilder.appendValue(""+item.getId());
            csvBuilder.appendValue(ddPaymentMethod.getMandateIdentification());
            csvBuilder.appendValue("" + item.getAmount());
            csvBuilder.appendValue(PARAM_2);
            csvBuilder.startNewLine();
        }
        csvBuilder.toFile(getDDFileName(methodContext));
    }

    /**
     * the sepa reject file will be named as : RejectSEPA_{LotID}-{processed|rejected}.csv with lines like : numFacture;codeError
     * 
     */
    @Override
    public DDRejectFileInfos processSDDRejectedFile(Map<String, Object> methodContext) throws BusinessException {
        try {
            File sepaRejectedFile = (File) methodContext.get(DDRequestBuilderScript.DD_REJECT_FILE);
            if (sepaRejectedFile == null) {
                throw new BusinessException("sepaRejectedFile is null");
            }

            DDRejectFileInfos ddRejectFileInfos = new DDRejectFileInfos();
            String lotid = sepaRejectedFile.getName().substring(sepaRejectedFile.getName().indexOf("_") + 1, sepaRejectedFile.getName().indexOf("-"));
            String paymentFileStatus = sepaRejectedFile.getName().substring(sepaRejectedFile.getName().indexOf("-") + 1, sepaRejectedFile.getName().indexOf("."));
            ddRejectFileInfos.setDdRequestLotId(new Long(lotid));
            ddRejectFileInfos.setFileName(sepaRejectedFile.getName());           
            if ("rejected".equals(paymentFileStatus)) {
                // the case when the sepaFile (for payment) , was rejected in protocol level (before even read items)
                ddRejectFileInfos.setReturnStatusCode("invalid name or format");
                ddRejectFileInfos.setTheDDRequestFileWasRejected(true);
            } else {
                CsvReader csvReader = new CsvReader(sepaRejectedFile.getAbsolutePath(), ';');
                while (csvReader.readRecord()) {
                    String fields[] = csvReader.getValues();
                    String codeFacture = fields[0];
                    String causeRejet = fields[1];
                    ddRejectFileInfos.getListInvoiceRefsRejected().put(new Long(codeFacture), causeRejet);
                }
            }

            return ddRejectFileInfos;
        } catch (Exception e) {
            throw new BusinessException(e.getMessage());
        }
    }

}


		   ]]>
            </script>
            <executionRoles name="administrateur"></executionRoles>
            <sourcingRoles name="administrateur"> </sourcingRoles>            
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>
      </ws:createOrUpdate>\r
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r
   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>\r
      <ws:createOrUpdate>\r
         <module code="${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_CustomGatewayPaymentModule" license="GPL" description="Custom gateway payment module">\r
            <moduleItems>\r
               <script code="org.meveo.service.script.smoove.${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_CustomGatewayPaymentScript" description="CustomGatewayPaymentScript">\r
                  <type>JAVA</type>\r
                  <script><![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script.smoove;

import java.io.StringReader;
import java.util.Map;

import javax.xml.xpath.XPath;
import javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException;
import javax.xml.xpath.XPathFactory;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.model.payments.CardPaymentMethod;
import org.meveo.model.payments.PaymentStatusEnum;
import org.meveo.service.script.payment.PaymentScript;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
import org.xml.sax.InputSource;


public class ${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_CustomGatewayPaymentScript extends PaymentScript{

	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_CustomGatewayPaymentScript.class);

	@Override
	public void createCardToken(Map<String, Object> methodContext) throws BusinessException {			
		methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_TOKEN, "7ced0000-3ab2-000d-6a50-08d4b8a6"+(int )(Math.random() * 1000 + 1));
	}

	@Override
    public void doPaymentToken(Map<String, Object> methodContext) throws BusinessException {
	    doIt(methodContext, "PAL");
	}  
	
	@Override
    public void doRefundToken(Map<String, Object> methodContext) throws BusinessException {
	    doIt(methodContext, "RFD");
    }
	
	
	
	private void doIt(Map<String, Object> methodContext,String operationType) throws BusinessException {
		try{
			log.debug("EXECUTE  methodContext {} ", methodContext);
			Long amountCts = (Long)methodContext.get(PaymentScript.CONTEXT_AMOUNT_CTS);
			if(amountCts == null){
				throw new BusinessException("amountCts is null");
			}
			CardPaymentMethod paymentToken = (CardPaymentMethod)methodContext.get(PaymentScript.CONTEXT_TOKEN);
			if(paymentToken == null){
				throw new BusinessException("paymentMethod is null");
			}

			String body  = "{";
			body  += " \"PSPID\" : \"PSPID\" ,";
			body  += " \"USERID\" : \"USERID\" ,";
			body  += " \"PSWD\" : \"PSWD\" ,";
			body  += " \"REFKIND\" :  \"PSPID\" ,";
			body  += " \"REFID\" : \"PSPID\" ,";
			body  += " \"OPERATION\" : \""+operationType +"\" ,";
			body  += " \"AMOUNT\" : \""+amountCts.longValue()+"\" ,";
			body  += " \"CURRENCY\" : \""+paymentToken.getCustomerAccount().getTradingCurrency().getCurrencyCode()+"\" ,";
			body  += " \"TRANSACTIONID\" : \""+paymentToken.getTokenId()+"\" ,";
			body  += " \"SHASIGN\" : \"SHASIGN\" ,";
			body  += " }";
			log.debug("request body {} ", body);
/*			ApiExecutor apiExecutor = new ApiExecutor(); 
			HttpResponse httpResponse = apiExecutor.executeApi("/dl/maintenance", "https://ogone.test.v-psp.com", null, null,
					HttpMethodsEnum.POST,CommonContentTypeEnum.JSON, null, null,
					body, null, null); 
			if(httpResponse != null){
				int responseStatusCode =
						httpResponse.getStatusLine().getStatusCode(); 
				String paymentResponse = EntityUtils.toString(httpResponse.getEntity());
				if(responseStatusCode == 200 ){
					String paymentStatus = getStatus(paymentResponse,"/root/STATUS");
					if("92".equals(paymentStatus)){
						methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_PAYMENT_STATUS, PaymentStatusEnum.ACCEPTED);
						methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_PAYMENT_ID, getStatus(paymentResponse,"/root/PAYID"));
						methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_TRANSACTION_ID, getStatus(paymentResponse,"/root/TRANSACTIONID"));
						methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_CODE_CLIENT_SIDE, getStatus(paymentResponse,"/root/CRMTOKEN"));
						methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_PAYMENT_BRAND, getStatus(paymentResponse,"/root/BRAND"));
						methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_BANK_REFERENCE, getStatus(paymentResponse,"/root/ACCEPTANCE")); 
					}else{
						methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_PAYMENT_STATUS, PaymentStatusEnum.REJECTED);
						methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_ERROR_MSG, getStatus(paymentResponse,"/root/NCERRORPLUS ")); 
					}
				}else{
					methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_PAYMENT_STATUS, PaymentStatusEnum.REJECTED);
					methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_ERROR_MSG, paymentResponse); 
				}
			}else{ 
				throw new
				BusinessException("Payment gateway response is null");
				 } 
*/
			String paymentResponse = "<root>"; 
			paymentResponse += "<STATUS>92</STATUS>";
			paymentResponse += "<PAYID>"+((int )(Math.random() * 100000 + 1))+"</PAYID>"; 
			paymentResponse += "<TRANSACTIONID>92</TRANSACTIONID>";
			paymentResponse += "<CRMTOKEN>clientSide</CRMTOKEN>"; 
			paymentResponse += "<BRAND>VISA</BRAND>";
			paymentResponse += "<ACCEPTENCE>bankRef</ACCEPTENCE>"; 
			paymentResponse += "</root>";
			methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_PAYMENT_STATUS, PaymentStatusEnum.PENDING);
			methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_PAYMENT_ID, getValue(paymentResponse,"/root/PAYID"));
			methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_TRANSACTION_ID, getValue(paymentResponse,"/root/TRANSACTIONID"));
			methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_CODE_CLIENT_SIDE, getValue(paymentResponse,"/root/CRMTOKEN"));
			methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_PAYMENT_BRAND, getValue(paymentResponse,"/root/BRAND"));
			methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_BANK_REFERENCE, getValue(paymentResponse,"/root/ACCEPTENCE"));			
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			throw new BusinessException(e.getMessage());
		}
	}	

	private String getValue(String sourceXML,String expression) throws XPathExpressionException{		
		InputSource iSource = new InputSource(new StringReader(sourceXML));
		XPathFactory xpathFactory = XPathFactory.newInstance();
		XPath xpath = xpathFactory.newXPath();		
		return xpath.evaluate(expression, iSource);			
	}
}]]></script>\r
               </script>\r
               <script code="org.meveo.service.script.smoove.${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_PaymentCallBackScript" description="Payment CallBack Script">\r
                  <type>JAVA</type>\r
                  <script><![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script.smoove;

import java.util.Map;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.model.payments.PaymentStatusEnum;
import org.meveo.service.payments.impl.PaymentService;
import org.meveo.service.script.Script;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

/**
 * 
 * @author anasseh
 *
 *         Script executed after a payment callBack (inbound request), if the payment is rejected , the invoice matching is removed and a new is created with a the new reject
 *         payment account operation
 *
 */

public class ${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_PaymentCallBackScript extends Script {

    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_PaymentCallBackScript.class);
    private PaymentService paymentService = (PaymentService) getServiceInterface("PaymentService");

    @Override
    public void execute(Map<String, Object> methodContext) throws BusinessException {
        log.debug("EXECUTE  methodContext {} ", methodContext);
        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
        Map<String, String> params = (Map<String, String>) methodContext.get("params");
        log.info("params:" + params);
        if (params.get("STATUS") == null) {
            throw new BusinessException("Parameter STATUS is required");
        }
        if (params.get("PAYID") == null) {
            throw new BusinessException("Parameter PAYID is required");
        }
        PaymentStatusEnum paymentStatus = PaymentStatusEnum.ACCEPTED;
        if (!"9".equals(params.get("STATUS"))) {
            paymentStatus = PaymentStatusEnum.REJECTED;
        }
        paymentService.paymentCallback(params.get("PAYID"), paymentStatus, params.get("NCERROR"), params.get("NCERROR"));
    }

}]]></script>\r
               </script>\r

               <jobInstance jobTemplate="PaymentJob" code="RefundCard_Job">

                     <customField code="PaymentJob_creditOrDebit">
                        <stringValue>Debit</stringValue>
                     </customField>                     
                  </customFields>
               </jobInstance>
               
            </moduleItems>\r
         </module>\r

   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r
   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>\r
      <ws:createOrUpdate>\r
      
         <module code="${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_SlimpayModule" license="GPL" description="SlimPay module">\r
            <moduleItems>\r 
               <script code="org.meveo.service.script.slimpay.CheckPaymentScript_${#TestSuite#index}" description="Check payment status">
                  <type>JAVA</type>
                  <script><![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script.slimpay;

import java.util.Map;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.api.dto.payment.PaymentResponseDto;
import org.meveo.model.payments.PaymentHistory;
import org.meveo.model.payments.PaymentStatusEnum;
import org.meveo.service.payments.impl.PaymentService;
import org.meveo.service.payments.impl.SlimpayGatewayPayment;
import org.meveo.service.script.Script;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

/**
 *
 * @author anasseh
 *
 *         Check payment status on slimpay
 *
 *         Execute Context Variable :
 *         <li>record : PaymentHistory entity
 * 
 *
 */
public class CheckPaymentScript_${#TestSuite#index} extends Script {

    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(CheckPaymentScript_${#TestSuite#index}.class);

    private PaymentService paymentService = (PaymentService) getServiceInterface("PaymentService");

    @Override
    public void execute(Map<String, Object> context) throws BusinessException {
        log.debug("EXECUTE context {}", context);
        PaymentHistory paymentHistory = (PaymentHistory) context.get("record");
        SlimpayGatewayPayment slimpayGatewayPayment = new SlimpayGatewayPayment();
        PaymentResponseDto paymentResponseDto = slimpayGatewayPayment.checkPayment(paymentHistory.getExternalPaymentId(), paymentHistory.getPaymentMethodType());
        if (paymentResponseDto == null) {
            throw new BusinessException("checkPayment paymentResponse is null");
        }
        if (paymentResponseDto.getPaymentStatus() != PaymentStatusEnum.PENDING) {
            paymentService.paymentCallback(paymentHistory.getExternalPaymentId(), paymentResponseDto.getPaymentStatus(), paymentResponseDto.getErrorCode(),
                paymentResponseDto.getErrorMessage());
        }
    }
}
]]></script>
               </script>
               <script code="org.meveo.service.script.slimpay.CreateMandateCallBackScript_${#TestSuite#index}" description="Create mandate callBack Script">
                  <type>JAVA</type>
                  <script><![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script.slimpay;

import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Map;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.api.dto.account.CustomerAccountDto;
import org.meveo.api.dto.payment.MandatInfoDto;
import org.meveo.model.notification.InboundRequest;
import org.meveo.model.payments.CustomerAccount;
import org.meveo.service.payments.impl.CustomerAccountService;
import org.meveo.service.payments.impl.PaymentMethodService;
import org.meveo.service.payments.impl.SlimpayGatewayPayment;
import org.meveo.service.script.Script;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
import com.google.gson.JsonParser;



/**
 * 
 * @author anasseh
 *
 *         Script executed after a create mandate callBack (inbound request), if state is 'closed.completed' so a new directDebit paymentMethod will be added to the
 *         customerAccount( the subscriber).
 */

public class CreateMandateCallBackScript_${#TestSuite#index} extends Script {

    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(CreateMandateCallBackScript_${#TestSuite#index}.class);
     private PaymentMethodService paymentMethodService = (PaymentMethodService) getServiceInterface("PaymentMethodService");
    private CustomerAccountService customerAccountService = (CustomerAccountService) getServiceInterface("CustomerAccountService");

    @Override
    public void execute(Map<String, Object> methodContext) throws BusinessException {
        log.debug("EXECUTE  methodContext {} ", methodContext);
        InboundRequest inboundRequest = (InboundRequest) methodContext.get("event");
        if (inboundRequest == null) {
            throw new BusinessException("inboundRequest is null");
        }
        log.debug("CreateMandateCallBback body " + inboundRequest.getBody());

        JsonParser parser = new JsonParser();
        JsonObject bodyCallBack = parser.parse(inboundRequest.getBody()).getAsJsonObject();
        String mandateState = bodyCallBack.get("state").getAsString();
        if (!"closed.completed".equals(mandateState)) {
            log.warn("EXECUTE  mandate not created, state:" + mandateState);
            return;
        }
        String mandateId = bodyCallBack.get("_links").getAsJsonObject().get("https://api.slimpay.net/alps#get-mandate").getAsJsonObject().get("href").getAsString();
        mandateId = mandateId.substring(mandateId.lastIndexOf('/') + 1);
        if (mandateId == null || mandateId.trim().length() == 0) {
            throw new BusinessException("Cant get mandate ID from slimPay sign madate Order callback.");
        }
        String referenceOrder = bodyCallBack.get("reference").getAsString();
        log.debug("CreateMandateCallBback mandateId:{} referenceOrder:{} ", mandateId, referenceOrder);
        SlimpayGatewayPayment slimPayGW = new SlimpayGatewayPayment();
        CustomerAccountDto caDto = slimPayGW.getSubscriberFromOrder(referenceOrder);
        if (caDto == null) {
            throw new BusinessException("Cant get customerAccount code from slimPay sign madate Order callback.");
        }
        CustomerAccount customerAccount = customerAccountService.findByCode(caDto.getCode());
        if (customerAccount == null) {
            throw new BusinessException("customerAccount with code:" + caDto.getCode() + " not exist.");
        }
        MandatInfoDto mandatInfoDto = slimPayGW.checkMandat(null, mandateId);
        if (mandatInfoDto == null) {
            throw new BusinessException("Cant get Mandate from slimPay sign madate Order callback.");
        }
        paymentMethodService.createMandateCallBack(customerAccount,mandatInfoDto);
    }
}
]]></script>
               </script>               \r

                 <notification code="${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_MandateCallBack">
                  <classNameFilter>org.meveo.model.notification.InboundRequest</classNameFilter>
                  <eventTypeFilter>INBOUND_REQ</eventTypeFilter>
                  <elFilter>#{event.pathInfo.startsWith("/DEMO/mandat-callback")}</elFilter>
                  <scriptInstanceCode>org.meveo.service.script.slimpay.CreateMandateCallBackScript_${#TestSuite#index}</scriptInstanceCode>

               <jobInstance jobTemplate="PaymentJob" code="PaymentSepa_Job">\r

                     </customField>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ws:createOrUpdate>\r
<module code="${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_IngenicoModule" license="GPL" description="Ingenico module">\r <moduleItems>\r <script code="org.meveo.service.script.ingenico.CheckPaymentScript_${#TestSuite#index}" description="Check payment status"> <type>JAVA</type> <script><![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script.ingenico;
import java.util.Map;
import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException; import org.meveo.api.dto.payment.PaymentResponseDto; import org.meveo.model.payments.PaymentHistory; import org.meveo.model.payments.PaymentStatusEnum; import org.meveo.service.payments.impl.IngenicoGatewayPayment; import org.meveo.service.payments.impl.PaymentService; import org.meveo.service.script.Script; import org.slf4j.Logger; import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
/** * * @author anasseh * * Check payment status on Ingenico * * Execute Context Variable : * <li>record : PaymentHistory entity * * */ public class CheckPaymentScript_${#TestSuite#index} extends Script {
private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(CheckPaymentScript_${#TestSuite#index}.class);
private PaymentService paymentService = (PaymentService) getServiceInterface("PaymentService");
@Override public void execute(Map<String, Object> context) throws BusinessException { log.debug("EXECUTE context {}", context); PaymentHistory paymentHistory = (PaymentHistory) context.get("record"); IngenicoGatewayPayment ingenicoGatewayPayment = new IngenicoGatewayPayment(); PaymentResponseDto paymentResponseDto = ingenicoGatewayPayment.checkPayment(paymentHistory.getExternalPaymentId(), paymentHistory.getPaymentMethodType()); if (paymentResponseDto == null) { throw new BusinessException("checkPayment paymentResponse is null"); } if (paymentResponseDto.getPaymentStatus() != PaymentStatusEnum.PENDING) { paymentService.paymentCallback(paymentHistory.getExternalPaymentId(), paymentResponseDto.getPaymentStatus(), paymentResponseDto.getErrorCode(), paymentResponseDto.getErrorMessage()); } } }
]]></script> </script> \r <filter code="PaymentsWaitingIngenicoCallbackFilter_${#TestSuite#index}" description="Payments waiting final status"> <shared>false</shared> <inputXml><![CDATA[<filter> <disabled>false</disabled> <appendGeneratedCode>false</appendGeneratedCode> <filterCondition class="andCompositeFilterCondition"> <filterConditionType>COMPOSITE_AND</filterConditionType> <filterConditions> <primitiveFilterCondition> <filterConditionType>PRIMITIVE</filterConditionType> <fieldName>paymentGatewayCode</fieldName> <operator>=</operator> <operand>INGENICO_OGONE_SEPA</operand> </primitiveFilterCondition> <nativeFilterCondition> <filterConditionType>NATIVE</filterConditionType> <jpql>asyncStatus is null</jpql> </nativeFilterCondition> </filterConditions> </filterCondition> <primarySelector> <targetEntity>org.meveo.model.payments.PaymentHistory</targetEntity> <alias>o</alias> <displayFields> <field>externalPaymentId</field> </displayFields> <exportFields/> <ignoreIfNotFoundForeignKeys/> </primarySelector> <secondarySelectors/> </filter>]]></inputXml> </filter> <jobInstance jobTemplate="PaymentJob" code="PaymentIngenicoSepa_Job">\r <jobCategory>PAYMENT</jobCategory>\r <active>false</active>\r <customFields>\r <customField code="PaymentJob_createAO">\r <stringValue>YES</stringValue>\r </customField>\r <customField code="PaymentJob_matchingAO">\r <stringValue>YES</stringValue>\r </customField>\r <customField code="PaymentJob_creditOrDebit"> <stringValue>Credit</stringValue> </customField> <customField code="PaymentJob_cardOrDD"> <stringValue>DIRECTDEBIT</stringValue> </customField> </customFields>\r </jobInstance> <jobInstance jobTemplate="FilteringJob" code="CheckPaymentIngenicoStatusFilterJob" timerCode="Daily-midnight"> <jobCategory>MEDIATION</jobCategory> <active>false</active> <customFields> <customField code="FilteringJob_recordVariableName"> <stringValue>record</stringValue> </customField> <customField code="FilteringJob_script"> <entityReferenceValue classname="org.meveo.model.scripts.ScriptInstance" code="org.meveo.service.script.ingenico.CheckPaymentScript_${#TestSuite#index}" /> </customField> <customField code="FilteringJob_filter"> <entityReferenceValue classname="org.meveo.model.filter.Filter" code="PaymentsWaitingIngenicoCallbackFilter_${#TestSuite#index}" /> </customField> </customFields> </jobInstance> </moduleItems>\r </module>\r </ws:createOrUpdate>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
